item.title: Elon Musk takes the return to office to new extremes—he claims he’s turned DOGE’s DC headquarters into his bedroom
item.description: Tesla CEO has a history of pulling all-nighters and demanding his workers to do so as well.

item.title: Google’s Gemini is helping hackers work faster but hasn’t unlocked new attacks—yet
item.description: Google's own cybersecurity teams found evidence of nation-state hackers using Gemini to help with some aspects of cyberattacks.

item.title: Chili’s is having a moment—with foot traffic up 20% last quarter
item.description: Company reports third consecutive quarter of double-digit sales growth.

item.title: Sneakers? Yes. Bibles? No. Here’s what you can buy with the Trump crypto
item.description: Memecoin has seen its value dip since Trump took office.

item.title: Pizza Hut and Domino’s have been rivals in the pizza world for years. Now they’re squaring off in an unexpected arena: bottled wine
item.description: Forget the noid. Avoid the sulfates.
